ExtendedSection.Title: Filling the form, validating and saving changes 5

Text.name: Text0
Text.content:
To validate your values against conditions defined in the XSD of the edited contentâ€™s type, call session.validate(values, replyHandler). After validation, the reply-handler is called and fed with a map containing the errors that occurred during the validation.

Saving content is very easy when no file upload is included: just call session.saveContent(values, successHandler, errorHandler). If files need to be uploaded, then first call session.uploadFiles(filefieldlist, successHandler, errorHandler) and update the content only on success. How to use this function should be clear from the above example.
